attributes.action: Wellingborough to get a 7 day a week out of hours doctors surgery.
attributes.additional_details:
I strongly believe Wellingborough needs an out of hours doctors surgery (like Keydoc in Kettering).
Not everyone can drive or is able to drive or get any kind of transport to get over to our 'local' out of hours!
It frustrates me at times and I believe alot of people will agree.
